Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
Unnai nAnallavO kaNNil varaindhEn nALum en Oviyam neethAnE
kaNNE un kaNNilE seidhi padiTHEn kAdhal pOrAttamE nAn pArTHEn 
mOgam pongi varum dhagam ? nAnumoru peNNalavO

iru nenjam inidhAga
